DOC.brief_title: Study Comparing Adapalene/BP Gel EPIDUO® FORTE Both Placebo Control Treatment Acne Vulgaris
DOC.detailed_description: Randomized , Double-Blind , Placebo-Controlled , Multiple-Site , Parallel Design , Bioequivalence Clinical Endpoints .
DOC.criteria: Healthy male non pregnant female age ≥ 12 ≤ 40years clinical diagnosis acne vulgaris . Female Subjects pregnant , nurse plan become pregnant study participation
